\w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w appeared|strong="H7200"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w him|strong="H7200"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w second|strong="H8145"\w* \w time|strong="H8145"\w*, \w as|strong="H3068"\w* \w He|strong="H3068"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w appeared|strong="H7200"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w him|strong="H7200"\w* \w at|strong="H3068"\w* \w Gibeon|strong="H1391"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1980"\w* \w as|strong="H6213"\w* \w for|strong="H6213"\w* \w you|strong="H6440"\w*, if \w you|strong="H6440"\w* \w walk|strong="H1980"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w Me|strong="H6440"\w* \w as|strong="H6213"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* father \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w walked|strong="H1980"\w*, \w with|strong="H1980"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w heart|strong="H3824"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w integrity|strong="H8537"\w* \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w uprightness|strong="H3476"\w*, \w doing|strong="H6213"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w I|strong="H6680"\w* \w have|strong="H3605"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w you|strong="H6440"\w*, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* if \w you|strong="H6440"\w* \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* \w My|strong="H8104"\w* \w statutes|strong="H2706"\w* \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w ordinances|strong="H4941"\w*,

\w But|strong="H3808"\w* \w if|strong="H1121"\w* \w indeed|strong="H7725"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w your|strong="H5414"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w turn|strong="H7725"\w* \w away|strong="H7725"\w* \w from|strong="H7725"\w* \w following|strong="H1980"\w* \w Me|strong="H5414"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w do|strong="H5647"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w commandments|strong="H4687"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w statutes|strong="H2708"\w* \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w have|strong="H1121"\w* \w set|strong="H5414"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w if|strong="H1121"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w go|strong="H1980"\w* \w off|strong="H6440"\w* \w to|strong="H1980"\w* \w serve|strong="H5647"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w worship|strong="H7812"\w* other \w gods|strong="H1980"\w*,

\w then|strong="H1961"\w* \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w cut|strong="H3772"\w* \w off|strong="H3772"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w from|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w land|strong="H6440"\w* \w that|strong="H5971"\w* \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w given|strong="H5414"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* banish \w from|strong="H6440"\w* \w My|strong="H5414"\w* \w presence|strong="H6440"\w* \w this|strong="H5414"\w* \w temple|strong="H1004"\w* \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w sanctified|strong="H6942"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w My|strong="H5414"\w* \w Name|strong="H8034"\w*. \w Then|strong="H1961"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w become|strong="H1961"\w* \w an|strong="H1961"\w* object \w of|strong="H1004"\w* scorn \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w ridicule|strong="H4912"\w* \w among|strong="H5921"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w peoples|strong="H5971"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w when|strong="H1961"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w temple|strong="H1004"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w become|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w heap|strong="H5945"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* rubble,\f + \fr 9:8 \ft Some LXX manuscripts, Syriac, and Arabic; Hebrew And though this temple is now exalted; see also 2 Chronicles 7:21.\f* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w pass|strong="H5674"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w appalled|strong="H8074"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w hiss|strong="H8319"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* say, ‘\w Why|strong="H4100"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w done|strong="H6213"\w* \w such|strong="H2088"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w thing|strong="H2088"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* land \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w temple|strong="H1004"\w*?’

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* others \w will|strong="H3068"\w* answer, ‘\w Because|strong="H5921"\w* \w they|strong="H3651"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w forsaken|strong="H5800"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w brought|strong="H3318"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* fathers \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* land \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* embraced \w other|strong="H3605"\w* gods, \w worshiping|strong="H7812"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w serving|strong="H5647"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w*—\w because|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w*, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w brought|strong="H3318"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w* \w disaster|strong="H7451"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w*.’” Solomon’s Additional Achievements (2 Chronicles 8:1–18)

\w Now|strong="H1961"\w* \w at|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w end|strong="H7097"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w during|strong="H1961"\w* \w which|strong="H3068"\w* \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* \w built|strong="H1129"\w* \w these|strong="H8147"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w houses|strong="H1004"\w*, \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w royal|strong="H4428"\w* \w palace|strong="H1004"\w*,

“\w What|strong="H4100"\w* \w are|strong="H3117"\w* \w these|strong="H2088"\w* \w towns|strong="H5892"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w have|strong="H3117"\w* \w given|strong="H5414"\w* \w me|strong="H5414"\w*, \w my|strong="H5414"\w* brother?” \w asked|strong="H4100"\w* Hiram, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w he|strong="H3117"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* Land \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w Cabul|strong="H3521"\w*,\f + \fr 9:13 \ft Cabul sounds like the Hebrew for good-for-nothing.\f* \w as|strong="H5704"\w* \w they|strong="H3117"\w* \w are|strong="H3117"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3967"\w* \w Hiram|strong="H2438"\w* \w had|strong="H4428"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w the|strong="H7971"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* 120 \w talents|strong="H3603"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*.\f + \fr 9:14 \ft 120 talents is approximately 4.52 tons or 4.1 metric tons of gold.\f*

\w This|strong="H2088"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w account|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w forced|strong="H4522"\w* \w labor|strong="H4522"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w King|strong="H4428"\w* \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* imposed \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w build|strong="H1129"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w his|strong="H3068"\w* own \w palace|strong="H1004"\w*, \w the|strong="H3068"\w* supporting terraces,\f + \fr 9:15 \ft Hebrew the Millo; also in verse 24\f* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w wall|strong="H2346"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, \w as|strong="H1697"\w* well \w as|strong="H1697"\w* \w Hazor|strong="H2674"\w*, \w Megiddo|strong="H4023"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w Gezer|strong="H1507"\w*.

\w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* \w had|strong="H8010"\w* \w attacked|strong="H5927"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w captured|strong="H3920"\w* \w Gezer|strong="H1507"\w*. \w He|strong="H5414"\w* \w had|strong="H8010"\w* \w set|strong="H5414"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w* \w on|strong="H3427"\w* fire, \w killed|strong="H2026"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w Canaanites|strong="H3669"\w* \w who|strong="H3427"\w* \w lived|strong="H3427"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w given|strong="H5414"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w* \w as|strong="H5927"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w dowry|strong="H7964"\w* \w to|strong="H5927"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w*, \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w*’s wife.
So \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* \w rebuilt|strong="H1129"\w* \w Gezer|strong="H1507"\w*, \w Lower|strong="H8481"\w* \w Beth-horon|strong="H1032"\w*,

\w Baalath|strong="H1191"\w*, \w and|strong="H4057"\w* \w Tamar|strong="H8559"\w* \f + \fr 9:18 \ft Alternate MT reading; the other alternate reads Tadmor\f* in \w the|strong="H4057"\w* \w Wilderness|strong="H4057"\w* \w of|strong="H4057"\w* Judah,\f + \fr 9:18 \ft Hebrew in the wilderness in the land\f*

\w their|strong="H5647"\w* \w descendants|strong="H1121"\w* \w who|strong="H1121"\w* \w remained|strong="H3498"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H5647"\w* land, \w those|strong="H1121"\w* whom \w the|strong="H5647"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w* \w were|strong="H3478"\w* \w unable|strong="H3808"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w devote|strong="H2763"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w destruction|strong="H2763"\w* \f + \fr 9:21 \ft Forms of the Hebrew cherem refer to the giving over of things or persons to the LORD, either by destroying them or by giving them as an offering.\f*—\w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* \w conscripted|strong="H5927"\w* \w these|strong="H2088"\w* \w people|strong="H1121"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w forced|strong="H4522"\w* \w laborers|strong="H4522"\w*, \w as|strong="H5704"\w* \w they|strong="H3117"\w* \w are|strong="H3117"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*.

\w They|strong="H5921"\w* \w were|strong="H5971"\w* \w also|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w chief|strong="H8269"\w* \w officers|strong="H8269"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w*’s projects: 550 supervisors \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w who|strong="H5971"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w work|strong="H4399"\w*.
